reactions.name: Water Formation
safetyWarnings: Risk of explosion with hydrogen gas
reactions.description: The synthesis of water from hydrogen and oxygen gases. This is a highly exothermic reaction that releases significant energy.
reactions.mechanism: The reaction proceeds through a radical chain mechanism initiated by a spark or catalyst.

reactions.name: Methane Combustion
safetyWarnings: Risk of carbon monoxide formation in incomplete combustion
reactions.description: Complete combustion of methane in oxygen, producing carbon dioxide and water vapor.

reactions.name: Sodium Chloride Formation
safetyWarnings: Sodium is highly reactive with water
reactions.description: Formation of table salt from sodium metal and chlorine gas.
